text: Judge Judy is an American streaming Court Show. The series premiered on September 16, 1996, and concluded on July 23, 2021. The court show ended with its 25th season. This courtroom program stars former family court judge Judy Sheindlin. Each episode finds Judge Judy presiding over real small-claims cases inside a televised courtroom. Her no-nonsense approach has been unsuccessfully copied by other TV court judges. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1996 American television series debuts Category:English-language television programs Category:American comedy television series Category:2000s American reality television series Category:2010s American reality television series Category:2021 American television series endings
title: Judge Judy
